operation.name: InsertBulk
operation.sql: INSERT INTO chat_participants (chat_id, user_id, participant_type, link, inviter_user_id, invited_at, is_bot, date2) VALUES (:chat_id, :user_id, :participant_type, :link, :inviter_user_id, :invited_at, :is_bot, :date2)

operation.name: InsertOrUpdate
operation.sql: INSERT INTO chat_participants (chat_id, user_id, participant_type, link, inviter_user_id, invited_at, is_bot, date2) VALUES (:chat_id, :user_id, :participant_type, :link, :inviter_user_id, :invited_at, :is_bot, :date2) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE participant_type = VALUES(participant_type), inviter_user_id = VALUES(inviter_user_id), link = VALUES(link), invited_at = VALUES(invited_at), is_bot = VALUES(is_bot), state = 0, kicked_at = 0, left_at = 0, date2 = VALUES(date2)

operation.name: SelectList
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, user_id, participant_type, link, inviter_user_id, invited_at, kicked_at, left_at, is_bot, state, date2 FROM chat_participants WHERE chat_id=:chat_id

operation.name: SelectChatParticipantIdList
operation.sql: SELECT user_id FROM chat_participants WHERE chat_id=:chat_id

operation.name: SelectByParticipantId
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, user_id, participant_type, link, inviter_user_id, invited_at, kicked_at, left_at, is_bot, state, date2 FROM chat_participants WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND user_id = :user_id

operation.name: SelectListByParticipantIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, user_id, participant_type, link, inviter_user_id, invited_at, kicked_at, left_at, is_bot, state, date2 FROM chat_participants WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND user_id IN (:idList)

operation.name: Update
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_participants SET participant_type = :participant_type, inviter_user_id = :inviter_user_id, invited_at = :invited_at, state = 0, kicked_at = 0, left_at = 0, is_bot = :is_bot WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateKicked
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_participants SET kicked_at = :kicked_at, left_at = 0, state = 2 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateLeft
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_participants SET kicked_at = 0, left_at = :left_at, state = 1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateParticipantType
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_participants SET participant_type=:participant_type WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectUsersChatIdList
operation.sql: SELECT chat_participants.chat_id AS chat_id, chat_participants.user_id AS user_id FROM chat_participants, chats WHERE chat_participants.state = 0 AND chat_participants.user_id IN (:idList) AND chats.id = chat_participants.chat_id AND chats.deactivated = 0

operation.name: SelectMyAdminList
operation.sql: SELECT chat_id FROM chat_participants WHERE user_id = :user_id AND participant_type = 1 AND state = 0

operation.name: SelectMyAllList
operation.sql: SELECT chat_id FROM chat_participants WHERE user_id = :user_id AND state = 0

operation.name: UpdateStateByChatId
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_participants SET state = :state WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND state = 0

operation.name: UpdateLink
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_participants SET link = :link WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND user_id = :user_id

operation.name: UpdateLinkUsage
